name: Notion Roadmap
description: Notion RoadmapWhy did I create this template?some people have asked me "what resources do you use?" "how do I become a creator?" "how do I create my first template?"that's why I created the notion roadmap. A place for beginners and advanced users.How you will benefit from the templatelearn how to build your own templatelearn how to sell your first templatelearn what websites you can use to build a better templateWhat is included75+ detailed resources for illustrations, icons and toolsdetailed in
features: learn how to build your own template; learn how to sell your first template; learn what websites you can use to build a better template; 75+ detailed resources for illustrations, icons and tools; detailed instructions on how to create and sell your template and how to become a creator; Notion Hacks; A notion roadmap with useful tutorials
